title: ennai viTTODAdEDA
sahitya:
ennALum inda bhAgyam vENDUmE hE gOpAlanE Ezhaikku


anupallavi

  unnaiyE enadu nA bhajikka un tiruvaDigaLai kai pUjikka


caraNam    kOTik-kavalaigaL shUzhinum manam Odiyalaindu tuyar Azhinum migha
 vADi uDal kai kAl kaNNedu sheyyinum pADi unnaiyE vazhipADu sheyya enakku
